messages.subject: Swordsmith Tokinaka ??
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone have any info on a smith signing: Chikuzen no ju Shimosaka Be-no-jo Tokinaka ? It is a Kanbun period style blade. Thanks Rich S ... Richard Stein,
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone have any info on a smith signing:

Chikuzen no ju Shimosaka Be-no-jo Tokinaka ?

It is a Kanbun period style blade.

Thanks
Rich S

------------------------------------------------------------
Richard Stein, PhD alchemyst@...

The Japanese Sword Index
http://www.geocities.com/alchemyst/nihonto.htm
